dialogue: You've been selected for our executive development program.
That means we can make you relocate to any godforsaken dirt stain we want.
As soon as you make friends or find romance, we'll move you to someplace new and worse.
It won't be the sort of work you'll enjoy, and the stress might kill you.
If you turn down this opportunity, the company will forever label you as a loser.
If you accept the offer, the company will train you to find pleasure in the discomfort of your underlings.
